title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; sync & async, supports chat, generate, embed, pull.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving LLM, embedder and retriever interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama: folders, shareable chats, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the REST API with chat REPL, model search and progress bars.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama-index to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Kotlin & Scala friendly) with reactive streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects Ollama service with decorators for chat, embed, model ops.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: Community gRPC server shim exposing Ollama with protobuf & streaming for high-throughput clients.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embed APIs with admin UI and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that auto-detects local Ollama models and adds speech-to-text.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, strongly-typed requests/responses and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, tool calling and streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector & autoscaling.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to chat with any local model in channels or DMs.

title: ollama-experiments
summary: Official repo of community experiments: vision, tool-use, function-calling, fine-tuning recipes.
